description:
iSound Recorder is based on the new innovative feature provided by webOS 2, the microphone API.
iSound Recorder allows you to Record, Play and Store all your voice memos or any sounds you want to capture.
iSound Recorder is the webOS application that allows you to use the full power of your Pre.
Features:
- Record voice memos, any sounds, ...
- Play current record or selected record from your list
- Store your records on a dedicated folder on the USB partition (/media/internal/iSound Recorder)
- Time duration while recording
- Graphic equalizer
- View list of all your records
- 3 choices of Sound Quality (High=705Kbps, Medium=256Kbps, Low=128Kbps)
